quote: Is there ever a time you’re not an arrogant bastard?”“Is there ever a time you’re not a difficult bitch?”“No.”“Then I guess that makes us perfectly matched, now doesn’t it?
quote_letters: IS THERE EVER A TIME YOURE NOT AN ARROGANT BASTARDIS THERE EVER A TIME YOURE NOT A DIFFICULT BITCHNOTHEN I GUESS THAT MAKES US PERFECTLY MATCHED NOW DOESNT IT
